frontend.question: What data type represents text in JavaScript?
What is the correct way to declare a variable in JavaScript?
What is the difference between var and let in JavaScript?

answers.one: var has global scope while let has block scope.
answers.two: var is re-assignable while let is not re-assignable.
answers.three: var can be used before it is declared while let cannot be used before it is declared.
answers.four: Both A and B are correct.

frontend.rightAnswer: var has global scope while let has block scope.

answers.four: Both A and C are correct.

frontend.question: What is the difference between inheritance and composition in JavaScript?

answers.one: Inheritance allows one object to inherit properties and methods from another object, while composition allows one object to contain other objects as properties.
answers.two: Inheritance is a static relationship, while composition is a dynamic relationship.
answers.three: Inheritance is used to create new classes, while composition is used to create new objects.
answers.four: All of the above are correct.

frontend.rightAnswer: All of the above are correct.
